name: gptrenderer

scripts.run:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext run --source-dir dist/firefox
scripts.build:xpi: npm run build:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir dist/firefox --artifacts-dir dist
scripts.zip:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../gpt-diagrams-chrome.zip .

description: Chrome and Firefox Extensions to visually render diagrams direct from AI generated code blocks
